content: the 2 sl sts 2trtog cluster into 2nd chain st ch3 2trtog cluster into next chain st right next to the other skip the next 2 sl sts and the 4dc 3dc on top of turning chain turn row 14 ch6 sk1 slip_stitch into next double_crochet slip_stitch into top of 2trtog cluster 5dc shell into the middle chain st of last ch3 between the 2trtog cluster sts slip_stitch to the top of 2trtog cluster slip_stitch into next double_crochet ch3 skip 1 double_crochet on top of turning chain turn row 15 ch4 2trtog cluster into 1st chain st of previous row skip the next 2 sl sts and the 2dc 3dc into middle double_crochet shell skip the next 2 sl sts and the 2dc 2trtog cluster into 3rd chain st ch1 double_crochet on top of turning chain turn row 16 ch3 4dc into same space of ch3 slip_stitch to the top of 2trtog cluster slip_stitch into next double_crochet ch4 sk1 slip_stitch into next double_crochet slip_stitch again to the top of 2trtog cluster 5dc on top of turning chain turn row 17- 36 s repeat row 13-16 × 5 17- 40 m repeat row 13-16 x 6 17- 44 l repeat row 13-16 x 7 row 37/41/45 repeat row 13 row 38/42/46 repeat row 14 row 39/43/47 repeat row 15 row 40/44/48 ch3 2dc on top of 2trtog cluster 2dc 3dc 2dc double_crochet on top of 2trtog cluster double_crochet on top of chain of previous row turn 12sts row 41/45/49 ch3 double_crochet dcdec double_crochet in the next 4 sts dcdec double_crochet in the last 2sts turn 10sts row 42/46/50 ch3 double_crochet dcdec double_crochet in the next 2 sts dcdec double_crochet in the last 2sts turn 8sts row 43/47/51 ch3 dcdec double_crochet
